description:
Donkey Kong Country 2 is an action platforming game. 
Play as Diddy Kong and his girlfriend Dixie as they go to Crocodile Isle 
to rescue Donkey Kong from the clutches of Kaptain K. Rool.

dkc2-v2.3.0.description:
Several new goodies
## Info
* Only the US 1.1/Rev 1 version is supported
  * MD5 US 1.1: `d323e6bb4ccc85fd7b416f58350bc1a2`
* Universal Tracker support
## Changes
### Additions
* Calling a `Backup DK Barrel` while you have the maximum number of Kongs alive will grant the player a protection layer which lasts for a single hit.
  * Persists between levels (and probably on/off cycles as well)
  * This is indicated by a static banana on the bottom left corner of the screen.
* Added support for Universal Tracker's Glitched Logic ™️ 
### Adjustments
* Calling a `Backup DK Barrel` while riding/being Squitter will now require pressing `Select` instead of `L` or `R`
* [Raspberryfloof] Better color adjustment via the palette filter option
* [Raspberryfloof] Allow generating 0 extra `Lost World Rocks`
### Fixes
* Glimmer's Galleon no longer has entities disappearing
* Some logic fixes for Screech's Sprint in Strict logic
## Known issues
* None I care about
dkc2-v2.3.0.title: Donkey Kong Country 2 v2.3.0

dkc2-v3.0.0r2.description:
"I can't believe I got this to work" ahh update
## Info
* Only the US 1.1/Rev 1 version is supported
  * MD5 US 1.1: `d323e6bb4ccc85fd7b416f58350bc1a2`
* Universal Tracker support
## Changes
### Additions
* A message is shown at the bottom of the screen when you receive or send items
  * This also adds a few extra options regarding which kind of messages you receive on screen, including filters for certain item classifications
  * This is a somewhat experimental feature which may lead to some occassional visual bug under certain scenarios
* There's an item tracker in game now, you can summon it while being on a map with `L` or `R`
  * It uses the message system to queue several messages that inform you about the items you have at the moment, not ideal but works fine
* Boss levels can be locked behind level clears in their respective worlds
* You're now able to alter the behavior of collecting a colored balloon, all KONG letters or 100 bananas to either grant extra lives or extra `Backup DK Barrel`s (you can now obtain `Backup DK Barrel`s when EnergyLink is disabled)
  * At the map, use the `SELECT` button to toggle between reward types
  * There's a small icon in the bottom right corner. If Diddy the reward will be extra lives, if Dixie the reward will be extra `Backup DK Barrel`s
* There's a way to visualize in-game how many `Backup DK Barrel` items are left. A counter will appear on top of the player when they:
    * Enter a level
    * Use a `Backup DK Barrel`
    * Gain a `Backup DK Barrel`
    * Get hurt
* It's now possible to run your own custom trivia database alongside the one provided in the apworld
* Added options to change the Animal Buddies palettes
* Added the current version to the Title Screen
* Replaced the original credits text with text related to the people involved in the randomizer

### Adjustments
* A Diddy icon is shown instead of a Banana when you have an extra hit active
* Getting hit while being protected by an Extra Hit will get rid of the current `Reverse Trap`
* Getting hit while being protected by an Extra Hit now plays the Kong getting hurt sound effect
* Renamed `player_palettes` and `player_palette_filters` options to `palettes` and `palette_filters` respectively to properly match their new purpose
* Altered the default options to have a better "new player" experience
* Reduced Swanky challenges cost, they now cost a single Banana Coin to try
  * Swanky @ Galleon has all of his challenges available for free
* You can no longer visit Cranky with `L` + `R` during the map
* Reduced the chance of generating Banana Coins as filler items
* Made `Backup DK Barrel`s appear more often as filler items
* Updated the TrapLink database
* Updated the trivia database
  * We have over 600 questions now!

### Fixes
* Using Start Inventory From Pool (and possibly Plando as well) no longer has chance of picking UT's glitched item
  * It's forced to replace items with Backup DK Barrels
* Losing multiple Extra Hits inside hot/toxic water no longer spams hit detection VFX like crazy
* Fixed being able to interact with Clapper on Lava Lagoon when it was submerged in liquid without unlocking him first
* Jungle Jinx no longer loses most of its sounds effects when a `Backup DK Barrel` is requested or an Extra Hit is lost

## Known issues
* There's a rare chance of overloading the SFX queue which will cause the game to stop playing sounds and softlock upon triggering a screen transition
* Castle Crush sometimes doesn't properly load messages
* Banana Coins may randomly reset to 0 in rare situations
dkc2-v3.0.0r2.title: Donkey Kong Country 2 v3.0.0

dkc2-v3.0.1.description:
Some quick fixes
# Info
* Only the US 1.1/Rev 1 version is supported
  * MD5 US 1.1: `d323e6bb4ccc85fd7b416f58350bc1a2`
* Universal Tracker support
# Changes
## Fixes
* Reworked SFX queue between SNIClient and the game
* Not having a valid directory for custom trivia no longer crashes the patching process

Also check out [v3.0.0](https://github.com/TheLX5/Archipelago/releases/tag/dkc2-v3.0.0) for the full feature changelog
dkc2-v3.0.1.title: Donkey Kong Country 2 v3.0.1

dkc2-v3.0.2.description:
Small round of fixes and additions
# Info
* Only the US 1.1/Rev 1 version is supported
  * MD5 US 1.1: `d323e6bb4ccc85fd7b416f58350bc1a2`
* Universal Tracker support
# Changes
## Additions
* Level clears per world are sent to DataStorage
## Fixes
* Fixes Lost World goal not bein able to be generated
* Attempt to fix a sound crash related to KONG letters granting a `Backup DK Barrel`
# Known issues
* Castle Crush sometimes doesn't properly load messages
* Banana Coins may randomly reset to 0 in rare situations
dkc2-v3.0.2.title: Donkey Kong Country 2 v3.0.2

dkc2-v3.0.3.description:
More fixes
# Info
* Only the US 1.1/Rev 1 version is supported
  * MD5 US 1.1: `d323e6bb4ccc85fd7b416f58350bc1a2`
* Universal Tracker support
# Changes
## Additions
* Banana Coins are now saved into the save file
* Collected locations (regardless if they're from `!collect` or not) no longer create in-game messages
* Added a manifest file for AP 0.7.0+ support
## Fixes
* Actual good attempt at fixing the SFX crash caused by obtaining a Backup DK Barrel via KONG letters
* Klubba no longer resets the Banana Coin counter to 1 after "paying" him the toll he asks for
# Known issues
* If the game is under high stress the game will fail to properly load the message text graphics
* The `Backup DK Barrel` counter may wrap around the screen without the current Kong
dkc2-v3.0.3.title: Donkey Kong Country 2 v3.0.3

dkc2-v3.0.4.description:
# Info
* Only the US 1.1/Rev 1 version is supported
  * MD5 US 1.1: `d323e6bb4ccc85fd7b416f58350bc1a2`
* Universal Tracker support
# Changes
## Adjustments
* Updated the trivia database
## Fixes
* Clapper's Cavern DK Coin logic is now consistent with Bonus 1 in Strict and Loose logic levels
# Known issues
* If the game is under high stress the game will fail to properly load the message text graphics
* The `Backup DK Barrel` counter may wrap around the screen without the current Kong
dkc2-v3.0.4.title: Donkey Kong Country 2 v3.0.4
